name: SPA Salon Clean up
description: Neni runs a famous Spa Salon in her town and she really enjoys to spend her day making sure all of her clients leave her little corner of Heaven of Earth looking stunning and relaxed! But after a long day of facial treatments, relaxing back massages with hot stones and other therapies, cute Neni has to make sure she leaves her salon sparkly clean and ready for the next day. The cleaning sessions aren’t quite some of her favorites so why don’t you ladies step in getting this fun cleaning game started and help her out a bit? Find the right place for each item, collect the leftovers and put them in the dustbin and mop the floor to make sure everything is sparkly clean. Good luck and have a great time, ladies!
